html:
Grab Apple's best monitor, the Studio Display, with savings of $305 off with Amazon's short-term deal.

You have to be fast with Prime Day sales on Amazon, but you can get some exceptional bargains — this time including savings on different configurations of the coveted Apple Studio Display. The standard model is now 19% off at $1,294.99.

That's more than Amazon's own sale in August 2024, and it's a discount of over $300 for Apple's own 5K 27-inch display, perfect for using with everything from a Mac mini (on sale now) to an iPad Pro (also marked down).

This base model comes with a tilt-adjustable stand and standard (instead of nano-texture) glass. But there are also savings to be had on many other configurations of the Apple Studio Display.

For instance, you get the same 19% off for buying the version with a VESA mount adapter. If you go for the tilt and height adjustable stand, you can have the Apple Studio Display for $300 off at $1,699.99.
